Constructor Detail

Room

public Room(java.lang.String pDescription,
            java.lang.String pImageName)
Create a room described "description". Initially, it has no exits. "description" is something like "a kitchen" or "an open court yard".

Parameters:
pDescription - The room's description

Room

public Room(java.lang.String pDescription,
            java.lang.String pImageName,
            Item pItem)
Create a room described "description" containing an Item. Initially, it has no exits. "description" is something like "a kitchen" or "an open court yard".

Parameters:
pDescription - The room's description.
pItem - The room's item
pImageName - The room's image path

getDescription

public java.lang.String getDescription()
Returns:
The short description of the room (the one that was defined in the constructor).

getExitString

public java.lang.String getExitString()
Return a description of the room’s exits, for example, "Exits: north west".

Returns:
A description of the available exits.

getLongDescription

public java.lang.String getLongDescription()
Return a long description of this room, of the form: You are in the kitchen. Exits: north west
